item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A ChatGPT clone, in 3000 bytes of C, backed by GPT-2 (2023) (195 points | 58 comments)
2. Parkinson's Law: It’s real, so use it (12 points | 11 comments)
3. Certain names make ChatGPT grind to a halt, and we know why (108 points | 42 comments)
4. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (584 points | 208 comments)
5. Run Database in GitHub Actions, Persisting Data to S3, and Access It Publicly (28 points | 23 comments)
6. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (787 points | 395 comments)
7. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (315 points | 493 comments)
8. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (124 points | 22 comments)
9. The Cold Email Handbook (223 points | 107 comments)
10. Timemap.org – Interactive Map of History (18 points | 1 comment)
11. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (191 points | 38 comments)
12. Review of Mullvad VPN (343 points | 115 comments)
13. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (380 points | 134 comments)
14. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (250 points | 321 comments)
15. The Marvelous Disappearing Capacitor (12 points | discuss)
16. Tricking c64 basic into clearing a hi-res screen quickly (40 points | 7 comments)
17. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (220 points | 41 comments)
18. Deciphering C++ compiler errors: Nonsensical errors from a function declaration (25 points | 12 comments)
19. Small Businesses vs. Corporations: What Tech Tools Are We Missing? (12 points | 18 comments)
20. The GPU is not always faster (153 points | 81 comments)
21. Instant macOS install on Proxmox including AMD patches (133 points | 41 comments)
22. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (104 points | 61 comments)
23. Stimulating parts of the brain can help the paralysed to walk again (12 points | 2 comments)
24. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (142 points | 77 comments)
25. Dear OAuth Providers (251 points | 60 comments)
26. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (334 points | 214 comments)
27. The Myth of Bananaland (132 points | 96 comments)
28. Geometry clipmaps: simple terrain rendering with level of detail (2017) (13 points | discuss)
29. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (232 points | 90 comments)
30. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (147 points | 75 comments)
